blocks.data: Returns the categories tree, a nested lineage of the categories with parent->child relationship. The Category objects returned are simplified versions of the category objects returned in the rest of this API.

### OAuth Scopes
|  **UI Name** | **Permission** | **Parameter** |
| --- | --- | --- |
|  Products | modify | `store_v2_products` |
|  Products | read-only | `store_v2_products_read_only` |

### Headers

|Header|Parameter|Description|
|-|-|-|
|`X-Auth-Token`|`access_token `|Obtained by creating an API account or installing an app in a BigCommerce control panel.|

### Example

```http
GET /stores/{$$.env.store_hash}/v3/catalog/summary
host: api.bigcommerce.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-Auth-Token: {access_token}
```

* For more information on Authenticating BigCommerce APIs, see: [Authentication](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-docs/getting-started/authentication).
* **Name**: X-Auth-Token
* **Location**: header

items.title: categoriesTreeNode_Full

id.description: The unique numeric ID of the category; increments sequentially.

parent_id.description: The unique numeric ID of the category's parent. This field controls where the category sits in the tree of categories that organize the catalog.

name.description: The name displayed for the category. Name is unique with respect to the category's siblings.

is_visible.description: Flag to determine whether the product should be displayed to customers browsing the store. If `true`, the category will be displayed. If `false`, the category will be hidden from view.

url.description: The custom URL for the category on the storefront.

children.description: The list of children of the category.
